member.summary: Gets covariance between two variables

member.summary: Gets the average deviation of a list of numbers
member.param: Numbers to get average deviation for

member.summary: Gets the entropy of a distribution

member.summary: Gets the KL-divergence between a distribution and the uniform distribution

member.name: M:LAIR.Math.GetKLDivergence(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Single},System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Single})
member.summary: Gets the KL-divergence between two distributiona

member.summary: Scales a list of floats to a distribution

member.summary: Gets cosine similarity between two vectors indexed by strings

member.summary: Gets cosine similarity between two vectors indexed by integers

member.summary: Gets cosine similarity of two vectors

member.summary: Gets the disjunctive probability for a list of event probabilities
member.returns: Disjunctive probability for a list of event probabilities

member.summary: Gets the disjunctive probability for a list of event probabilities
member.returns: Disjunctive probability for a list of event probabilities

member.name: M:LAIR.Math.GetFMeasureFromCounts(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Gets F-measure given total reference items, predicted items, and true predictions

member.summary: Gets F-measure given precision, recall, and beta.

member.summary: Gets F-measure given precision, recall, and beta=1

member.summary: Gets a basic histogram of data

member.summary: Writes an ROC curve from predictions
member.param: Predictions, where each tuple is the predicted probability and the true binary class.

member.name: M:LAIR.Math.GetBootstrapStatistics(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Object},System.Int32,LAIR.Math.BootstrapStatisticDelegate)
member.summary: Gets bootstrap statistics
member.param: Number of bootstrap resamples to take
Delegate for computing a statistic over a resample

member.name: M:LAIR.Math.GetPercentileConfidenceInterval(System.Single,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Single},LAIR.Math.Tail,System.Single@,System.Single@)
member.summary: Gets the (1-alpha)*100 percent confidence interval using the bootstrap sampling method described by Keller et. al (2005).
member.param: Statistics to get confidence interval for

member.name: M:LAIR.Math.GetFisherExactSignificance(System.Int32[][],System.Boolean)
member.summary: Performs a one-sided exact Fisher significance test on a 2-by-2 matrix, optionally performing a two-sided test.
member.param: 2-by-2 matrix to test. The main diagonal denotes the reference "situation". All "more extreme situations" are computed by subtracting from the non-main diagonal and adding to the main diagonal. See the literature for a discussion.
Whether or not to perform a two-sided test
member.returns: Probability of the matrix proportions (or those more extreme) being generated by chance, assuming the marginals remain the same.

member.name: M:LAIR.Math.GetFisherExactProbability(System.Int32[][])
member.summary: Gets the Fisher-exact probability of a 2-by-2 matrix

member.name: M:LAIR.Math.GetFactorial(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a factorial

member.summary: Copies a matrix

member.summary: Tails

member.summary: Right tail

member.summary: Two-tailed

member.name: T:LAIR.Math.BootstrapStatisticDelegate
member.summary: Delegate for functions that compute a bootstrap statistic
member.param: Sample data from which to compute bootstrap
member.returns: True if statistic should be used and false otherwise
